howItWorks.question: How does the bot work?
howItWorks.answer: Just take a photo of food and send it to Telegram. The bot will calculate calories, proteins, fats, carbohydrates and vitamins in 5 seconds.

accuracy.question: Does it count calories accurately?
accuracy.answer: Accuracy 85-95% depending on photo quality. If something is wrong ‚Äî just write to the bot, and it will fix it.

price.question: How much does it cost?
price.answer: Free forever! No subscriptions and hidden payments. Just launch and use.

calendar.question: Does it save to calendar?
calendar.answer: Yes! All results automatically go to your Google Calendar. Connect once ‚Äî and everything works.

photos.question: What photos work?
photos.answer: Any! From salad to pizza. The main thing is that the food is clearly visible in the photo.

correction.question: Can I correct the result?
correction.answer: Of course! If the bot made a mistake ‚Äî just write to it what's wrong, and it will recalculate.

blog.title: Healthy Nutrition Blog
blog.subtitle: Useful articles about calorie counting, nutrition analysis and healthy lifestyle
blog.author: Author

podschet-kaloriy-po-foto-telegram-bot.title: Calorie counting by photo: how it works and why you need a Telegram bot for nutrition analysis
podschet-kaloriy-po-foto-telegram-bot.excerpt: Nutrition control is the foundation of a healthy lifestyle. But manual calorie counting is boring routine. Today everything has changed: Telegram bots with AI have appeared...

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Nutrition control is the foundation of a healthy lifestyle. But manual calorie counting is boring routine: searching for each product in an app, entering weight, checking tables. As a result, many give up, although tracking calories and macros helps with weight loss, muscle gain, or simply eating right.
introduction.paragraph2: Today everything has changed: Telegram bots with artificial intelligence have appeared that can count calories from photos. Just photograph your plate - and in a few seconds you know the exact amount of calories, proteins, fats, carbohydrates and even vitamins.
introduction.paragraph3: In this article, we'll look at how it works, who needs it, and why it's the future of fitness and nutrition.

whyImportant.title: üìå Why it's important to count calories and macros

weightControl.title: Weight control
weightControl.content: To lose weight - you need a calorie deficit, to gain muscle mass - a surplus. Without accurate counting, it's easy to make mistakes.

macroBalance.title: Macronutrient balance
macroBalance.content: Even with the same calorie content, food can be healthy or 'empty'. Proteins are needed for muscles, fats for hormones, carbohydrates for energy.

avtomaticheskiy-dnevnik-pitaniya.title: Automatic nutrition diary: scientific facts, research and the future of diet control
avtomaticheskiy-dnevnik-pitaniya.excerpt: Modern people face a paradox: there's too much nutrition information, but controlling your own diet is still difficult. In this article, we'll explore how automation can solve this problem.

ii-v-pitanii-kak-iskusstvennyy-intellekt.title: AI in nutrition: how artificial intelligence is changing health and people's habits
ii-v-pitanii-kak-iskusstvennyy-intellekt.excerpt: Artificial intelligence already helps doctors make diagnoses, predict weather and even drive cars. But few people think that AI can change our nutrition...

pochemu-vazhno-sledit-za-kaloriyami-nauk.title: Why it's important to track calories: science, health and practical conclusions
pochemu-vazhno-sledit-za-kaloriyami-nauk.excerpt: Calories are not just numbers in an app, but the foundation of metabolism and weight control. Health, mood and even life expectancy depend on how much we eat and spend energy...

googleCalendar.title: 4. Google Calendar Integration
googleCalendar.description: When connecting Google Calendar, we request minimally necessary permissions:
googleCalendar.saveOnlyNutrition: We save only nutrition analyses (date, time, macros)
googleCalendar.noAccessOther: We do NOT have access to view other calendars
googleCalendar.noReadExisting: We do NOT read existing events in your calendars
googleCalendar.canDisable: You can disable integration at any time
